attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a busy town centre, betwixt main road & mostly sub-let Victorian villas, hides The Secret Garden. Pride & joy of a lady resident until her death 10 years ago. Now Mother Nature has take over. Awesome in its bio-diversity, home to a plethora of wildlife:- bats, foxes, deer, rabbits & badgers; nesting for many birds; small rodents make it a haunt for red kites. It has a breathtaking diversity of flora; original orchard, walnut tree, wisteria, magnolias & rhododendrons thrive amongst dog roses, hawthorn, hazel, holly, & ivy. Developers have applied for planning permission to erect 13 new dwellings on this site. This is in keeping with current government guidelines for low-cost housing. The actual plans show higher-cost housing. Only the affluent could afford them, & would not wish to live in such a run-down area. A handful of long-term residents who own properties adjacent to & overlooking The Secret Garden are fighting to keep their little nature reserve from the clutches of the gargantuan bulldozers & all they represent. Please help to save this environmentally important area.
